1.verse: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

2.verse: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

3.verse: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

4.verse: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

5.verse: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

6.verse: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

7.verse: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

8.verse: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

9.verse: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

10.verse: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

11.verse: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

12.verse: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

13.verse: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work's sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

14.verse: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

15.verse: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

18.verse: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

21.verse: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

22.verse: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

23.verse: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

24.verse: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

26.verse: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

27.verse: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

28.verse: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
